attributes.review: I was excited to get the app to write a review after not using the app at all. my grandma came in and said dinner is ready but this was important. when my pet unicorn saw that the app was on my phone he tried to run away but after we sat down and had coffee while i explained he understood and went to spread the news. soon after i went home to investigate. my cousins girlfriends brothers uncles grandmas neices son came over to my house crying while he was covered in Cheeto puffs. I got so mad I stomped and jumped to Saturn and I found a magic iPhone 79 and I was taking the opportunity to discover technology from the future and when I turned on the iPhone 79 I saw an article in the news app that says Trump had an army of vsco girls from 10 years before the iPhone 79 came out and I was scared. ⚠️ DOWNDLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK ⚠️ consequences are brutal. Also Trump gives my pet unicorn constant seizures. 😢
attributes.title: ⚠️ WARNING ⚠️ BAD APP 😰

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what Mr. Bunker Boy was up to and his face is everywhere!! The user interface is AWFUL and I could barely find my way around the app! It took sooo long to download that I was able to make dinner for my entire family while it was downloading! I’m a single mother with four children, so I don’t have time to wait for an app to download! Outrageous!
attributes.title: So awful!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
